title: Как у них получилось?
overview: A show by journalist Alexander Murashev, in which he does NOT talk about the "beautiful Russia of the future" in theory. Alexander Murashev goes to countries where the most painful problems for Russia could once be found: from landfills the size of cities to corruption and the prison system. And he finds out how they managed to solve these problems. In the first part of the season, together with Alexander Murashev, you will visit Japan, Singapore, Taiwan and South Korea.
